title: Silver->Bronze?
body:
Just what is the requirement to demote from Silver 5? I've lost like 500 games in Silver 5 and still am not Bronze. I gain +13 LP for wins...

p.s. I'm not trying to drop to Bronze. I'm just curious.

replies.body: i think you need bronze 5 mmr while being on s5 0lp and then losing
I think you would need to go below bronze 5 elo, (Which of course is not possible) hence is the reason why you have not been demoted.

Holy shit, how low if you're only getting 13 LP for wins...

I was told that if you're getting low LP per win, then you belong in a lower division or something.

or sometimes you get paired up with a platinum player in a premade with 2 other gold player with the same clan tag, and here you are as a silver scrub, up against other silver and bronze scrubs and you know that if you don't feed, the game is already won.
